name: Young Sapphire Dragon
languages: Common, Deep Speech, Draconic, Undercommon, telepathy 120 ft.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Discognitive Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon unleashes psychic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw  taking 49 (9d10) psychic damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

special_abilities.name: Far Thoughts
special_abilities.desc: The dragon is aware of any creature that uses a psionic ability or communicates telepathically within 100 miles of it. As an action, the dragon can psionically observe a creature, object, or location it is familiar with within 100 miles. While observing a subject in this way, the dragon can see, hear, and communicate telepathically, but it is blind and deaf in regard to its physical senses and does not require food or water. The dragon can psionically observe a subject indefinitely and can end this effect and return to its own senses as an action.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The dragons spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3/day each:comprehend languages, detect thoughts
